Posts.Content: For those of you w/joint and bone pain .... I too had those 2 yrs. ago, but kept up lifting 5 lb. weights in the a.m. for 4 min. + walking 30 min. 4 nights per week. Found after 4-5 months that these symptoms practically disappeared .... hope this helps.
Posts.Title: on Femara For Two Yrs.
